name: dark root.cz without garbage
description:
Based on "New root.cz in black version" from Dadko.
Modified some dimensions, hidden lot of stuff, Arial font, etc...
additional_info:
v0.5

v0.6
* input[type="submit"]{background-image}

v0.7
* discussion__item:hover
* img opacity

v0.8
* "responsive" down to width of 1000 px
* smaller images
* blockquote

v0.9
* .page and .sidebar postion copied from DarkRoot1.1

v0.10

v0.11

* corrected opener

* bug: tips vs. discussion

* sizes, etc...
